TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MobileControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供所有 ASP.NET Mobile 控制項的剖析支援。

span.span: Provides parsing support for all ASP.NET mobile controls.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站 (機器翻譯)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在內部建立並剖析行動控制項時，頁面剖析器使用的類別物件。The class object is internally created and used by the page parser when parsing a mobile control. 行動控制項實作自己的自訂持續性，必須使用控制項產生器，繼承自類別。Mobile controls that implement their own custom persistence must use a control builder that inherits from class. 類別會實作下列的持續性行為：The class implements the following persistence behavior: - 會忽略控制項內部的空白字元。Ignores white space directly inside the control. - 會辨識物件。Recognizes objects. - 會強制執行形式是最上層。Enforces that forms are at the top level. - 會強制執行樣式表位於最上層。Enforces that style sheets are at the top level. - 會強制執行樣式的樣式表中。Enforces that styles are in style sheets.

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

summary.span: 判斷控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容是否允許空白字元常值。

span.span: Determines whether white space literals are permitted in the content between a control's opening and closing tags.
